description:
Get your favorite car and have fun driving through the traffic while trying to avoid causing any accidents. Drive endlessly on a busy road, bypassing other cars meanwhile. Try to not crash and get as much score as possible!
    For maximum safety, the car has cruise control activated so you will always travel at a fixed speed. Immerse yourself within the game and admire the beautiful low-poly graphic style.
   Let’s see how good you are at the game and let’s see how far you can reach. Beat your friends’ high score and then play again for gun! Get your favorite car and let’s get going!
    Game Features:
--Endless mode on the highway
--Cruise control set up at a 75km/h speed
-- 27 cars to choose such as racing cars, police car or even tanks
--Get a reward in-game every 6 hours
name: Supreme Car Race on Highway Simulator - Ultimate Driving Games Poly Experience
